title: Program for Improving Science Learning Outcomes Using Constructivist E-Learning Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Non-real-time online education applying constructivist approaches for intermediate-level learners in science disciplines

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain science concepts at ≥80% accuracy through constructivist inquiry activities
Learners achieve ≥90% feedback-based task performance while engaging in knowledge construction activities with peers using online collaboration tools
Learners systematically document and present the entire process from science experiment design to result analysis in an e-portfolio
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
